text: Hagi keho! Jerusalemi kumaku'ma hu'na Nagri nagima mesiema hu'na hu'noa kuma esera eri haviza hute'na, ana maka vahera zamazeri haviza hugahuanki tatresigeta amne manigahune huta tamagesa ontahiho. Nagra Ra Anumzana hankavenentake Anumzamo'na huanki'na, ha' vahe huzmantenuge'za ama mopafina vano nehu'za maka vahera hara huzamante'za vano hugahaze.
